title: Pesticide Application Record Keeping
description: After spraying a field, a farmer needs to create a legally compliant record of the application.

tasks.description: Gather all required information for the record: date, time, field name, product applied, application rate, weather conditions (wind speed/direction), and applicator name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary data points.

tasks.description: Create a formal application record in the farm management system.
Verify that the record meets all state and federal regulatory requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the record is compliant.
